thread.title: AP PHOTOS: Promoting James Bond from 'Dr. No' to 'Spectre'
thread.title_full: AP PHOTOS: Promoting James Bond from 'Dr. No' to 'Spectre'

title: AP PHOTOS: Promoting James Bond from 'Dr. No' to 'Spectre'
text: > Entertainment AP PHOTOS: Promoting James Bond from 'Dr. No' to 'Spectre' File - In this Apr. 25, 1963 file photo, Sean Connery and Italian actress Daniela Bianchi are seen in Istanbul, Turkey. The pair were in the country filming the second Bond film, 'From Russia with Love.' Connery was playing the British secret agent for the second time in what many critics consider to be one of the best Bond film of all. His suave but menacing Bond remains the standard for many Bond fans. The upcoming new Bond film "Spectre" starring Daniel Craig has its World Premiere on Monday Oct. 26, 2015, in London.(AP Photo, File)
